ContactDto.title: ContactDto
ContactDto.description: A contact represents a natural person or legal entity, and the way to contact them. Shall an identity/company have multiple postal addresses through which it may be contacted. These are represented as 2 different contacts.
ContactDto.x-ms-summary: A contact represents a natural person or legal entity, and the way to contact them. Shall an identity/company have multiple postal addresses through which it may be contacted. These are represented as 2 different contacts.

name.description: The name of the contact. For more detailed information load the contact via id.

contacts.description: List of the contacts associated to the contract.

endDate.description: Date the validity period of the contract ends to. Null is interpreted as end of time.

name.description: Name of the contract consisting of the unit key and name of the mailing contact.

startDate.description: Date the validity period of the contract starts from. Null is interpreted as beginning of time.
startDate.x-ms-summary: Date the validity period of the contract starts from. Null is interpreted as beginning of time.

type.description:
Type of the contract. 
1. OWNER - a contract of such type proves ownership of the unit. 
2. TENANT - represents an agreement between a unit owner and a tenant. 
3. TENANT_VACANCY - used for vacancy periods of a unit. 
4. PROPERTY_OWNER - a contract of such type proves ownership of the property.
type.x-ms-summary:
Type of the contract. 
1. OWNER - a contract of such type proves ownership of the unit. 
2. TENANT - represents an agreement between a unit owner and a tenant. 
3. TENANT_VACANCY - used for vacancy periods of a unit. 
4. PROPERTY_OWNER - a contract of such type proves ownership of the property.

state.description:
State of the invoice. Possible values: 
1. DRAFT - invoice created, but incomplete. 
2. READY - invoice ready to be booked. 
3. BOOKED - invoice booked. 
4. SCHEDULED - only applies to recurring invoices. 
5. REVERSED - all bookings generated by the invoice have been reversed.
state.x-ms-summary:
State of the invoice. Possible values: 
1. DRAFT - invoice created, but incomplete. 
2. READY - invoice ready to be booked. 
3. BOOKED - invoice booked. 
4. SCHEDULED - only applies to recurring invoices. 
5. REVERSED - all bookings generated by the invoice have been reversed.

laborCostAmount.description: Amount relevant for income tax declaration according to the Income Tax Act: [Einkommenstueregesetz EStG 35a](https://www.gesetze-im-internet.de/estg/__35a.html).
laborCostAmount.x-ms-summary: Amount relevant for income tax declaration according to the Income Tax Act: [Einkommenstueregesetz EStG 35a](https://www.gesetze-im-internet.de/estg/__35a.html).

laborCostType.description:
Depending on the selected type: percentages of the amounts will be reported on the 35a annexes of multiple reports according to the Income Tax Act: [Einkommenstueregesetz EStG 35a](https://www.gesetze-im-internet.de/estg/__35a.html). 

Ex: Housemoney Settlement (Hausgeldabrechnung) or Opscost Report (Nebenkostenabrechnung). 

1. HOUSEHOLD_RELATED_SERVICES - haushaltsnahe Dienstleistungen 
2. TECHNICIAN_SERVICE - haushaltsnahe Handwerkerleistungen 
3. MARGINAL_EMPLOYMENT - haushaltsnahe geringfgige Beschftigungsverhltnisse 
4. INSURABLE_EMPLOYMENT - sozialversicherungspflichtigen haushaltsnahen Beschftigungsverhltnissen
laborCostType.x-ms-summary:
Depending on the selected type: percentages of the amounts will be reported on the 35a annexes of multiple reports according to the Income Tax Act: [Einkommenstueregesetz EStG 35a](https://www.gesetze-im-internet.de/estg/__35a.html). 

Ex: Housemoney Settlement (Hausgeldabrechnung) or Opscost Report (Nebenkostenabrechnung). 

1. HOUSEHOLD_RELATED_SERVICES - haushaltsnahe Dienstleistungen 
2. TECHNICIAN_SERVICE - haushaltsnahe Handwerkerleistungen 
3. MARGINAL_EMPLOYMENT - haushaltsnahe geringfgige Beschftigungsverhltnisse 
4. INSURABLE_EMPLOYMENT - sozialversicherungspflichtigen haushaltsnahen Beschftigungsverhltnissen

propertyHrId.description: Human readable id of the property instance.
propertyHrId.x-ms-summary: Human readable id of the property instance.

state.description:
Current state of the property. 
1. DRAFT - property not activated yet, therefore no bookings/bank orders/reports can be generated. 
2. READY - property has been activated and can be used for bookings/bank orders/reports generation. 
3. DISABLED - property has been deactivated, and can no longer generate bookings/bank orders/reports.
state.x-ms-summary:
Current state of the property. 
1. DRAFT - property not activated yet, therefore no bookings/bank orders/reports can be generated. 
2. READY - property has been activated and can be used for bookings/bank orders/reports generation. 
3. DISABLED - property has been deactivated, and can no longer generate bookings/bank orders/reports.

type.description: Administration type of the property. OWNER - Home Owner Association. RENTAL - Tenant Management.

type.description: Purpose the unit is used for.APARTMENT - unit used for residential purposes. PARKING - unit used for parking purposes. COMMERCIAL - unit used for business/commercial purposes. OTHER - unit used for other purposes.
type.x-ms-summary: Purpose the unit is used for.APARTMENT - unit used for residential purposes. PARKING - unit used for parking purposes. COMMERCIAL - unit used for business/commercial purposes. OTHER - unit used for other purposes.
